name: COALITION OF RDOF WINNERS
sampleDescriptions: Funding and implementation issues relative to the Rural Digital Opportunity Fund. Tax treatment of federal grants for broadband deployment in S. 341, the Broadband Grant Tax Treatment Act.
Funding and implementation issues relative to the Rural Digital Opportunity Fund. Tax treatment of federal grants for broadband deployment in S. 341, the Broadband Grant Tax Treatment Act.
Implementation issues pertaining to the FCC's Rural Digital Opportunity Fund (RDOF) program and need for a complementary funding initiative.
Tax treatment for grants made under the Rural Digital Opportunity Fund (RDOF), including provisions in S. 341, The Broadband Grant Tax Treatment Act.
Implementation issues pertaining to the FCC's Rural Digital Opportunity Fund (RDOF) program and need for a complementary funding initiative.
